text: A summary of the story can give almost no indication of the scope of Wicki's artistry. He tells his story best in the faces of his crowds, recording every wrinkle and drop of sweat with brutal honesty, building up to a tremendous climax in the island orgy. Here, the guests arrive in ghost-like yachts, the wildly flapping white sails slashed by the glaring beacon of a lighthouse.
